node.title: Public Relationship
node.content: Public relations is a strategic communication process that builds mutually beneficial relationships between organizations and their publics.” Public relations can also be defined as the practice of managing communication between an organization and its publics.

node.title: Youth Empowerment
node.content: Youth empowerment is a process where children and young people are encouraged to take charge of their lives. They do this by addressing their situation and then take action in order to improve their access to resources and transform their consciousness through their beliefs, values, and attitudes.

node.title: Igueben is a Local Government Area
node.excerpt: Igueben is a Local Government Area in the Edo Central District of Edo State of Nigeria. The Headquarters is in the ancient town of Igueben. Igueben has an area of 380 km² and a population of 69,639 according to the 2006 census. The post code is 310. History According to available history culled from Wikipedia, […]

node.title: THE ONOJIE OF IGUEBEN KINGDOM – HRM EHIZOGIE ELUOJIERIOR JP.
node.excerpt: On 6 December 1956, a male child named Ehizogie, was born into the Royal family of His Royal Highness, Eluojierior Imadojemu II, the Onogie of Igueben, As the first male child with Royal blood, Ehizogie was therefore ordained by God to rule the people of Igueben KINGDOM.
